title: Generate Dubbing Script for Foreign Language
description: A TV show needs to be dubbed into German. An agent must generate a time-coded script for the German voice actors.

tasks.description: Retrieve the original English dialogue script and the final video file.
Translate the English script into German.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a German translation of the dialogue.

tasks.description: Use the video file to add precise time-codes to the German script, indicating when each line should be spoken.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a final, time-coded dubbing script ready for the recording studio.
